differences.gitbook: UPDATE STATUS ON DEVELOPMENT: AJ and Advanceameyaw gave the updates on the Collaboration Skill Database; they presented the work done so far visually, and requested feedback on whether it would be suitable to add existing data to the database. Lordkizzy made some clarity on the scope of the project and suggested that the existing data gets differentiated from the new data. AJ and Advanceameyaw requested two more weeks from the inital deadline for development and testing.
differences.supabase: UPDATE STATUS ON DEVELOPMENT: AJ and Advanceameywu gave the updates on Collaboration Skill Database; they presented the workdone so far visually, and requested for feedback on if it would be suitable to add existing Data to the Database, Lordkizzy made some clarity on the scope of the project and suggested that the exisiting data gets differentiated from the new data, they also requested for more two weeks from the inital deadline for development and testing.

differences.gitbook: R&D Guild Proposal Template: Lord kizzy presented the final draft of the proposal template to the group for feedback. Here is the document: https://docs.google.com/document/d/14cl-X09nWY2RIDKcPWZv14-JbQqohovggJ0HOp6DKXk/edit He also highlighted the timeline for this process: New proposal submission applications, August 27th - September 3rd. Review process, September 4th - 10th. Community voting, September 11th - 18th.
